headline: Is Dollar Tree’s 44.9% Rally in 2025 Still Offering Real Value?
summary: Wondering if Dollar Tree is a hidden gem, or if its current price still offers real value? You’re not alone. Let’s dig in together and see what’s really going on under the surface. Recently, Dollar Tree’s stock has delivered a strong 8.8% gain over the last week and an impressive 44.9% return year-to-date, putting it firmly back on investors’ radars. Several headlines have been giving Dollar Tree extra attention lately, including reports on its evolving product lines and strategy shifts...
